attributes.action: call a re- election in the regions of Yorkshire and the North West where BNP have taken seats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that the BNP be banned and therefore have no place in the European Parliament.We ask that the Prime Minister consider a re-election in both the North-West and Yorkshire regions, to demonstrate our intolerance towards this form of politics.
